text:
[[Fairhaven]]'s Sunset Ward is most famous for being the home of the [[headquarters|Wayfinder Foundation Headquarters]] of the world-renowned [[Wayfinder Foundation]]. Many of the shops and services in the district attempt to capitalize on that fame by adding some variation of "Wayfinder's" to their name.

!! Noteworthy Locations

* [[Wayfinder Foundation Headquarters]]
* ''Wayfinder's Rest'' (inn)
* ''Wayfinder's Brewery and Spirits'' (tavern)
* ''Wayfinder Foundation Surplus'' (supplies)
* ''Chered & Gordau'' ([[inquisitive]]s)
title: Sunset Ward
